narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Discovery Living Inc. is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Cedar Rapids, IA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $82.0M in Medicaid payments across 28K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $82.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
